English:
My brother was protecting us.
And to think... I had forgotten... everything.
Chinese:
哥哥保護了我們……
但是……我居然……全都忘了……
Korean:
오빠는, 우리들을 감싸고서…
그런데도… 난, 잊고 있었어… 전부…
German:
Mein Bruder hat uns beschützt.
Dass ich das alles vergessen konnte ...

English:
Could that Eater actually have come from our
world, then?
Chinese:
那個侵食者，該不會……
是從我們的世界過來的……？
Korean:
혹시, 그 이터는…
우리들의 세계에서, 넘어 온 거야…?
German:
Kam dieser Verschlinger dann vielleicht aus
unserer Welt?

English:
Is it our fault that the Eaters came to the
Digital World?
Chinese:
都、都是我們害的……
讓侵食者在數碼世界……
Korean:
우, 우리들 때문에…
디지털 월드에, 이터가…?
German:
Sind wir schuld, dass die Verschlinger in die Digitale Welt
gelangt sind?
Das seid ihr in der Tat!

English: Have you recalled the heinous crime you committed?
Chinese: 想起自己犯下的重罪了嗎？
German:
Erinnert ihr euch jetzt an euer scheußliches
Verbrechen?

English:
The seal on your memory has at last been broken.
If you don't remember, this all means nothing.
Chinese:
我特地解開你們“被封印的記憶”。
要是不給我想起來，我就白費力氣了。
Korean:
"기억의 봉인"을 일부러 풀어 주었다고
기억해내지 않으면 보람이 없지
German:
Endlich ist euer Gedächtnis wiederhergestellt.
Ansonsten wäre dies alles bedeutungslos.

English:
You stumbled heedlessly into the Digital World,
and foolishly called the Eaters with you.
Chinese:
你們不慎來到數碼世界，
愚蠢到將侵食者呼喚過來——
Korean:
네놈들은, 부주의하게 디지털 월드에 찾아와
어리석게도 이터를 불러들였고―
German:
Ihr seid leichtsinnig in die Digitale Welt getapst
und habt die Verschlinger mitgebracht.

English: The door closed with the trash left behind.
Chinese: 居然還把伙伴（垃圾）留在這裡後，就關上了門。
Korean: 그뿐만 아니라 동료(쓰레기)도 남긴 채로, 문을 닫아 버렸다
German:
Das Portal schloss sich und der Unrat blieb bei
uns.

English: Then the world's order began to unravel.
Chinese: 世界的法則就是從那時開始扭曲！
German: Dann ging die Ordnung der Welt zugrunde.

Chinese: 世界就是從那時開始崩壞！
German: Und so beginnt das Ende der Welt!

English:
That's right! Tremble in despair!
Pay for your crime! Begone from existence!
Chinese:
很好……！恐懼吧……絕望吧……！
贖罪吧！給我從這個世界消失！
Korean:
좋다…! 떨어라… 절망해라…!
속죄해라! 이 세상에서 사라져라!
German:
Jawohl! Erzittert vor Furcht!
Erhaltet eure gerechte Strafe! Ihr werdet getilgt!

English:
This feeling, girl, it gives me shivers of joy.
Heh heh, hehehehe...
Chinese:
這個感覺……姊姊我啊，覺得好興奮呀～♪
哦呵、哦呵呵呵呵……♪
Korean:
이 느낌… 언니, 흥분해 버려~♪
우후, 우후후후후…♪
German:
Mir laufen Freudenschauer über den Rücken.
Hehe, hehehehe ...

Chinese: 呵呵……呵呵呵……呵哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！
